ANGR  Agricultural  University,  Dept.  of  Soil  Science  and  Ag.
Chemistry Hyderabad, India - Research Assistant  (1996-98)
Responsibilities  included  Collection  of  Soil,  waste  water  and  plant
samples from Maize Research Station, Hyderabad, India which is being
irrigated with raw muncipal sewage water for the past 50 years in an
effort  to  study  the  effect  of  wastewater  irrigation  on  soil  chemical
properties and heavy metal  uptake by Maize plants; Analysis  of soil,
plant  and  water  for  physico-chemical  properties  and  heavy  metals;

metals in soils and uptake of heavy metals by plants
